EN: It smelled like a normal day, with the scent of opportunity
It felt like a normal summer day, with clear blue skies painted...
But this day was most unlike all the rest.
You, slave girl, what's your name?
Today was the day I would become king!
Good. Now, there's just the small matter of the entry fee.
Right, you're officially a servant. Duties include cleaning, bowing, and not asking questions. The King wants to see you.
He's inside. Don’t keep him waiting
Ah, the new servant! Perfect timing. See that thing stuck outside the window? Get it for me.
Ah, good effort. Now, just hand it
You stare out the window. The river carries the King away. No body. No witnesses.
